full_summary:
**W6862-220112-A Gas Alarm Monitor System Inspection, Testing and Maintenance**
=====================================

**Tender Information**
---------------------

*   **Publication Date**: October 31, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 25, 2022 @ 2:00 PM
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 21, 2022
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: December 20, 2025

**Tender Details**
----------------

The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites bidders to submit proposals for the installation, examination, calibration and testing of all Gas Alarm Annunciation Systems at Canadian Forces Base Comox, Lazo, BC.

The contract will be awarded for a three-year term with task authorizations (CTA), including irrevocable options to extend the CTA for two additional one-year periods.

**Evaluation Criteria**
--------------------

The proposals will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit (70%) and price (30%), including a minimum technical rating of 28/43.

**Security Requirements**
-----------------------

This requirement contains security requirements, which must be met as per the contract.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Geographic Location**
-----------------------

The Gas Alarm Monitor System Inspection, Testing and Maintenance services are required for Canadian Forces Base Comox, Lazo, BC.

**Notice**
-------

The tender notice is available at the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14508454?extsite=MTQ1MDg0NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14508454?extsite=MTQ1MDg0NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For any questions or concerns, please contact Thomas Leboeuf, SPAC/PSPC, at thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.  Merchant Regulation mavynes cruise eginalSubgenre worksheets Static PDF
